## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String)

### Optional

- `local` (Boolean) Defaults to `false`.
- `tls_authentication` (String)
- `tls_verification` (String)
- `url` (String) Defaults to `http+unix:///var/run/docker.sock`.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
